glsa.title: Squid: Denial of Service
glsa.synopsis: Squid is affected by a Denial of Service vulnerability.

background.p: Squid is a multi-protocol proxy server.

description.p: Squid incorrectly handles TRACE requests that contain a "Max-Forwards" header field with value "0" in the clientProcessRequest() function.

impact.p: A remote attacker can send specially crafted TRACE HTTP requests that will terminate the child process. A quickly repeated attack will lead to a Denial of Service.

workaround.p: There is no known workaround at this time.

resolution.p: All Squid users should upgrade to the latest version:
